text: "Marry Me" is a 2013 song by American singer Jason Derulo and is taken from his albums Tattoos and Talk Dirty. It went to number 5 in Belgium, number 8 in Australia, number 14 in New Zealand, number 23 in Japan, number 26 in the United States and number 27 in Austria. == Track listing == * Digital download # "Marry Me" â€“ 3:45 == References == Category:2013 songs Category:Jason Derulo songs
title: Marry Me (Jason Derulo song)
